website_summaries.verdict: This organic mouthwash harmonizes the mouth’s natural ecosystem and eliminates bad breath.
pros: Contains a rich blend of essential oils, 21 potent sea minerals, and soothing aloe vera
cons: May burn the tongue and throat

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL PRODUCT!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!!!!! I had a little bit of an infection in my mouth and it cleared it up; without me having to take any medications. I am extremely allergic to medications so it is always such a trial and error type of situation and very expensive. This wonderful mouth wash cleared it up with no reactions from my mouth and and no complications. I love it and use it twice a day every day. I usually cannot use anything this often, as I am so sensitive. But this product works for me. So am loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They have removed the zinc. This was h e ...
customer_reviews.text: They have removed the zinc. This was h e one real ingredient that set this product apart. Will look elsewhere own that this has silently been removed from ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: the revJ

customer_reviews.title: Cured my coated tongue
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was cursed with bad coated white tongue for life. After 6 weeks of using this twice a day I am happy to say my tongue is pink and healthy. It also tastes great and makes my whole mouth feel clean and fresh. Will be a user as long as they keep making it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOTICE
customer_reviews.text: ORIGINAL REVIEW: A very good product. I prefer this over others I've tried, including Toms. UPDATED REVIEW: I just changed my star rating from 5 to 1. I received a recall notice about Pseudomonas aeruginosa in this product!
customer_reviews.author: Theophrastus

customer_reviews.title: Effective while preserving your oral microbiome
customer_reviews.text: What drew me to this product was that it does not destroy your oral microbiome. Many commercial rinses are great at killing bacteria, but they are killing the GOOD bacteria, too, which keep your mouth healthy and promote remineralization of your teeth. I also have dry mouth and Lumineux does not use alcohol or other drying ingredients. I like the fresh taste of it, and even though I was only going to use it once a day, I find myself *wanting* to use it twice a day because it leaves my teeth feeling so nice.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi D'Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: After lots of research, I have initiated a complete oral health care overhaul (goodbye fluoride, glycerin, etc). This mouthwash is the last piece of the puzzle -- I just received it today but am already very pleased! After using, my mouth felt clean and my teeth were bright. I am so excited to continue using this, and to see positive changes after long term use. Other reviewers mentioned a weird smell/taste, but as someone who is sensitive to these things, I didn't experience any problems at all, and actually found the flavor quite refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: GGTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: The ONLY mouthwash I can use.
customer_reviews.text: Most mouthwashes on the market are extremely harsh; I consistently get something called "black hairy tongue" (NSFW...you've been warned) with every other mouthwash on the market. Apparently, alcohol can strip away the good bacteria in our mouths, leading to the disturbing BHT from above. I've been using this mouthwash a little over a month and have not experienced any negative symptoms. It's extremely gentle, yet effective. Two thumbs way up.
customer_reviews.author: late_bloomer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best chemical and suger free mouth wash that I've found
customer_reviews.text: This is the best chemical and suger free mouth wash that I've found. I don't know why people complain so much about the taste. It really doesn't taste like anything to me. It also doesn't burn my mouth like leading brands which you think would give that a bad taste review. It really leaves a very nice clean feeling. I did however need to take one star off because the price is silly. Either make the bottle bigger or lower the price. If you use enough of this stuff everyday the bottle wont last very long. You might have to choose between netflix or it at some point. Not a fan of that idea.
customer_reviews.author: Shon

customer_reviews.title: Healthy mouthwash
customer_reviews.text: This is great stuff. The ingredients are really good and I feel great using it. I almost gave it 4 starts because it is an acquired taste but it's really fine. I diluted it a bit so it is good now. (makes it last a bit longer too) The company has great service and follows up for any problems or questions. Follow up after a month of use: I bought another bottle and diluted it a bit as the taste is strong but one of my teeth that was sensitive is about 80% less sensitive! I love the mouth the wash. It feels good to use such a healthy product!
customer_reviews.author: Jillybean16

customer_reviews.title: Really clean fresh more natural feeling
customer_reviews.text: I really like the natural feeling in my mouth in the morning. I used to get this dry mouth feeling using the other popular products after brushing overnight. Combined with the toothpaste, it's a really clean fresh, more natural feeling, no burning sensation from the alcohol like other popular products. The taste is a bit different, and more natural.
customer_reviews.author: DavidM

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect...
customer_reviews.text: Love the ingredients and that my kids can use it. Only thing that I don’t like is that it’s a little strong flavor... we can’t swish as long as we would like because it’s too intense. Starts to burn a little and my kids can’t tolerate that sensation long. We are using as part of of therapy to heal and prevent cavities. Overall I would still recommend because there aren’t many wholesome options at reasonable prices... so far this is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Arianna Francis

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE: Love this mouthwash but company sent me coupon for free product & never made good on it
customer_reviews.text: My family really enjoys this mouthwash, it has all the right ingredients for oral health--aloe vera, salt, xylitol, & great essential oils. It is expensive but a small amount works fine. I also like that it does not contain glycerin as most other more "natural" mouthwashes do. However, I have downgraded my review because I was sent a coupon for a free product & in the now almost three months that have passed, I have contacted them two times with no follow through. Very frustrating & misleading.
customer_reviews.author: K. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I chose this product based on stellar reviews and ingredients. I was not disappointed! I really enjoy this mouthwash and the clean feeling it leaves, as well as knowing it’s non-toxic! Can’t comment on the whitening aspect because my teeth are already pretty white. I would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Colao

customer_reviews.title: good stuff
customer_reviews.text: It is different from the Listerine "burn" that I became accustomed to. Not a knock against Listerine - it seemed to always get the job done. But I am trying to be better about what I am putting in/on my body. Doesn't make much sense to me to spend all that money eating organic to then introduce many of the things you were trying to eliminate by introducing them in other ways/products. Anyways, my observation thus far is as follows: 1) my mouth definitely feels clean after using; 2) seems to have similar results to other products in terms of eliminating morning breath; 3) I would recommend and will purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Mister Handsome

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! It has a wonder taste, leaves my mouth feeling fresh and isn’t over powering with the stinging and burning (like I get with other mouthwash products). I feel confident with the ingredients and love the way my mouth feels after using it. This is the first time I have tried these products and will definitely be purchasing more. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clean mouth...uh, yah!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad you emailed me to review this product~I have been looking for something natural to use, feeling like my mouth/teeth don't always feel clean, (I'm giving some to my nephew as well) I considered buying separate products at a Health Food store & essentially making my own, but that would be way pricey, so I settled for anything commercial & alcohol~free. Now that I've found Oral Essentials, there's no going back!!! The combination of ingredients plus xylitol is the key, especially clove. It's so mild, not harsh like commercial brands, swishing 60 seconds 2~3 times a day, really does the trick & lasts! I highly recommend this product, to anyone who's had similar oral concerns.
customer_reviews.author: Robin A. Hauptman

customer_reviews.title: Improved Gums and Sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: My go to every night before bed... so I know my mouth is fresh and clean while also keeping my natural oral biome safe. I've noticed a difference in both my teeth and gums... and less sensitivity. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: LMarie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this natural mouthwash! It’s light and fresh and tastes uhmazing! My dentist recommended it and carriers it in her office. I was hooked after the first bottle! I always reorder when I start to run low because I can’t stand to run out!
customer_reviews.author: southernbelle

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use mouthwash...but this is “non-toxic"
customer_reviews.text: I don’t use mouthwash. But lately I have been suffering with dry mouth, and wondered if using it would help. I actually think it is helping a bit. I can’t be sure as I haven’t been using it long enough to really note a HUGE difference. I do know that this stuff isn’t horrible, and since the reason I don’t use mouthwash is that it is all pretty much toxic, this is made with no unpronounceable ingredients. I will be ordering this again. It also appears that the company is a smaller one, and they seem to really care if I am satisfied, which I am.
customer_reviews.author: Carol L

customer_reviews.title: Holy Grail mouthwash!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stuff. The taste, the way it makes my mouth and teeth feel, and the fact that its vegan, cruelty free and not full of harsh chemicals. I use this with the Oral Essential whitening toothpaste and waited to use up one bottle and one tube of each before I came to write a review. I really feel like they have made a difference with keeping my teeth brighter and they leave my mouth feeling so fresh. Really recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: A clean, healthy mouthwash that I feel good about using!
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to mouthwash for many reasons. I appreciate the quality and thought put into the ingredients. I do not feel guilty using this mouthwash. In fact, I feel better about my oral health while using it! My mouth feels clean each time I use it and it is not so harsh that it burns my mouth. My children even enjoy using it. I will most likely always purchase this mouthwash from here on out.
customer_reviews.author: Brandie Carter

customer_reviews.title: Worst mouthwash I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: Burned my tongue, tasted awful, caused me to cough all night. Threw it out.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Smith

customer_reviews.title: Gums Improved!
customer_reviews.text: Love the flavor of Lumineux and its effects of gums. Had sensitive and prone to bleeding gums, now they are pink and healthy. I add this product to my waterflosser and it's a powerhouse of cleanliness! Recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: Best Mouthwash Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mouthwash ever! It not only freshens one's breath, it is highly effective in preventing plaque buildup. It has a nice minty flavor enhanced by a very gentle sweetness. There is no sharp stinging and burning in the mouth as a result of using this mouthwash. My teeth even appear cleaner and whiter without the use of whitening strips. Try this product and you will find that like me, you will use it at least three times a day. This is now my mouthwash of choice and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Becareful of Busted Bottles
customer_reviews.text: Just now able to write a review, but one bottle actually came busted opened and empty. The other bottle was fine. I loved the flavor and the way it SLIGHTLY worked. But just wish that I would have been able to enjoy the second bottle I bought as well.
customer_reviews.author: April A Wyant

customer_reviews.title: Mouth health in a bottle!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent natural mouthwash. Contains all the key ingredients I am looking for and none that I avoid. Great for everyday use and/or therapeutic applications. I bit my cheek while eating causing serious damage, swelling... Mouthwash prevented it from becoming a mouthsore and greatly reduced inflammation. Great product and speedy shipping.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Garza

customer_reviews.title: Great NATURAL alternative to commercial mouthwashes
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for a natural yet effective mouthwash, and had even researched making my own; ain't nobody got time fo' dat! I decided to try Oral Essentials based upon the rave reviews, and I love it! I even set up a subscription to have it delivered regularly so I'll never run out. It's minty and refreshing without being overwhelming. Best of all, it's good for me and my choppers ... a little on the expensive side, but totally worth it in my book!
customer_reviews.author: negative creep

customer_reviews.title: Safe ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I choose this brand due to the fact that I was searching for safe ingredients in a mouth wash. It certainly exceeded my expectations. The flavor is fine- took a little getting use to. Overall, price is a little higher than I would want to spend, but you get what you pay for. As a side note, product says to discard after 3 months. I had to toss quite a bit out.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen K

customer_reviews.title: the lumineux mouth wash works as they say
customer_reviews.text: i had a very bad report from my dentist. he wanted me to use fluoride products to improve things. we found this product and decided to give it a try. on my next visit to the dentist i asked him to look around to see how things were coming along. he said i was tarter free and my gums looked good and pink. just to be totally honest i did increase my brushing to 3 times a day, but i don't think that would make my gums nice and pink. We are overall happy with this product, just wish it cost a little less.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Gregory

customer_reviews.title: This is a great mouthwash. My breath smells fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mouthwash. My breath smells fantastic. The challenge is that if you use the chemically enhanced products from major brands, your breath smells good, but 2 hours later it does not, and hence you need to use more of it. This is a great product. Would buy again. Also the best part is that I don't ever have to walk into target or walmart ever to get it. click click order.
customer_reviews.author: mb2016

customer_reviews.title: Save your oral microbiome friends
customer_reviews.text: Combined with other products, Lumineux mouthwash has helped to clear up some issues with inflamed gums and drymouth. Since Lumineux is designed to protect good bacteria and not loaded with unnecessary antibiotics I know my oral microbiome is safe. I plan to use this product going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Rhino

customer_reviews.title: Best mostly natural mouthwash yet
customer_reviews.text: Both my wife and I like this mouthwash. We would give it 4.5 stars if we could. We wanted something that had less or no alcohol and no fluoride. Also, freshens breath without numbing like we got with other brands. Our last bottle was a powerful alcohol type that we could not wait to spit out and get through. Now, the gurgling for a minute and spitting out is pleasant. We would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D.

customer_reviews.title: The Best Oral Mouthwash on the Market!  It is Lumineux Oral Essentials Mouthwash...
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and I will purchase it again and again. It's simply the best oral mouthwash - ALL Natural and NON-TOXIC. It is Lumineux Oral Essentials Mouthwash...
customer_reviews.author: youngc777

customer_reviews.title: It okay...
customer_reviews.text: I personally don't like the taste, but, its no that bad. I guess there is really no way to tell if it is beneficial to use this high priced mouth wash over Listerine. I did get tired of my mouth and tongue burning from Listerine. I mainly bought this due to it having aloe vera oil in it.
customer_reviews.author: skuehnle

customer_reviews.title: Dentist recommended
customer_reviews.text: My dentist told me to use mouthwash and also rinse mouth with salt water, Mouthwash is too strong for me so this product is a perfect combination . I told the dentist about it and she said she would recommend it to her patients.
customer_reviews.author: miguel

customer_reviews.title: Superb Product-Healthier than Listerine - Will Continue to Buy
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Lumineux for months now and love it. It is all-natural and cleans my mouth, leaving it fresh, clean, smelling good, and healthy. Recommend it to anyone who hates using Listerine.
customer_reviews.author: Harry H. Husted

customer_reviews.title: Loving it,Well worth every Penny
customer_reviews.text: Im really loving this mouthwash,it's really gentle and the aftertaste is very minimal,which is a big plus for me considering how much i have hated using Listerine and Scope products. It's well worth every penny in my view,some might disagree,but thats why people are free to choose what's best for them and their general health.
customer_reviews.author: RogueShadows

customer_reviews.title: The taste is not what you expect! it is GROSS!
customer_reviews.text: I have used whitening products in the past and see no difference what so ever with this at all! I ordered the strips so I will give them a try and see if they do anything! My teeth are already pretty white but I like them to shine! this product did not do anything for my teeth at all!! and the taste is NASTY!
customer_reviews.author: Tobi

customer_reviews.title: Fresh breath that lasts but a bit pricy.
customer_reviews.text: The mouthwash is great. The flavor for the mint is perfect. Not too strong but enough that when you spit and take a breath in You can feel the coolness. It does taste a little salty but just a hint. The feel in your mouth also lasts a while making sure you know you have fresh breath. It is a bit pricy for mouth wash but for good products you expect to pay a bit more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cap was broken upon receipt
customer_reviews.text: Was looking forward to trying this product and was completely empty upon receipt! And now I find I can't return! UGH!
customer_reviews.author: William Kammerer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this mouthwash. I have nothing to complain about the ingredients (and I am very hard to please!) They are all wonderful ingredients, BPA free bottle by the way. Tastes great (it took some getting used to at first). On the rare occasion I use traditional mouthwash, it is way too strong for me. I prefer this stuff. I like both this formula and the whitening equally. Will continue to use this for as long as I can!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Using this amazing mouthwash for more than a year
customer_reviews.text: I started using the product a year back and now my wife and son also love to use the mouthwash. Love the taste of salt in it. After using the mouthwash for few days, my mouth felt clean. We are very much excited to continue using this and to see positive changes after long term use.
customer_reviews.author: KIRAN M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like the mouth wash an the toothpaste left my mouth feeling clean. I also like that theres not a bunch of chemical in it and it's more natural product.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Metzger

customer_reviews.title: Great natural mouth wash
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed on how refreshed my mouth feels using this product. I have tried many mouth washes but this one is the most natural mouth wash love it.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Wiles

customer_reviews.title: A natural product that works
customer_reviews.text: It’s so nice to use a natural product you can feel good about and it actually works! Freshens breath without harsh chemicals that kill your natural (good) bacteria.
customer_reviews.author: thr3shadesofpink

customer_reviews.title: I'm a fan of natural products but this one didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fan of natural products but this one didn't do it for me. Maybe I'm just too used to commercial mouth washes but I just never quite felt clean enough with this. I kept trying but unfortunately I wasn't able to commit to using this permanently in my regimen.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah O

customer_reviews.title: Great mouthwas
customer_reviews.text: Our family has used Lumineux for over a year. Doesn't burn your mouth and works well. We highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hager

customer_reviews.title: Great ingredients, takes some getting used to
customer_reviews.text: Love this mouthwash for the ingredients, taste and aftertaste could be a bit better but definitely is tolerable. Been looking for a healthy mouthwash so glad that this one is affordable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Eheaps

customer_reviews.title: Loose Protective Seal
customer_reviews.text: The protective seal was loose, like it had already been removed. I didn’t feel comfortable using it, so I threw it away since I was not allowed to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like this mouthwash
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mouthwash, especially since it's based on aloe vera and essential oils (instead of alcohol and all sorts of artificial chemicals). The primary issue for me is the price for such a small amount of product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and clean
customer_reviews.text: If you are used to using a Listerine type product, it may take you a bit to adjust to the flavor of this mouthwash. It does leave your mouth feeling very fresh and I'm glad I made the switch
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl M Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Great mouthwash!!
customer_reviews.text: I recently started having gum issues. So I bought this mouthwash based on the ingredients and benefits. I have noticed that my inflammation is going down. I also noticed my teeth are becoming whiter. I actually like the taste, although it is different from the big box stores flavors. It took the second time of using it to get adjusted to the new taste, but overall I am satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Up till now I hadn't found a mouthwash that was acceptable and was happy to see that Oral Essentials had no harmful chemicals ..
customer_reviews.text: Over the past few years I have become increasingly careful about my personal care products and completely avoid products containing harmful chemicals. Up till now I hadn't found a mouthwash that was acceptable and was happy to see that Oral Essentials had no harmful chemicals or alcohol added. I was dubious about how it would taste but was willing to give it a try. To my delight Oral Essentials tastes good and leaves no weird aftertaste. I have only been using it about 3 weeks but am confident that it will suit my families needs well.
customer_reviews.author: bilsgal

customer_reviews.title: A REAL winner!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS! I've been looking for a mouthwash that does a fantastic job without making my mouth feel funny or burn. This stuff is just wonderful. Will be in my healthcare regime permanently.
customer_reviews.author: sc2321

customer_reviews.title: Heals
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it is nontoxic plus it seems to heal mouth sores and gums. I gave it a 4 because of these qualities.
customer_reviews.author: jackisblest

customer_reviews.title: It will work
customer_reviews.text: I like it. But i think i need to give it time to work for my breath stop stinking. But it is good.
customer_reviews.author: harris baig

customer_reviews.title: Holy moly this stuff rocks
customer_reviews.text: Have I told you lately that I love you? Just got this a few days ago. I'm an all-natural/organic freak. This is by far my favorite of the 5-10 natural mouth washes I've tried over the years. But it's verrry concentrated, so I'll be adding some purified water to it. Great taste and smell. Seriously. I'm in love.
customer_reviews.author: Seattle4Sanders

customer_reviews.title: It has a taste...
customer_reviews.text: I'll tell you right now. if you are looking for a mouthwash that you put in a rock glass with a few cubes of ice,this ain't it. If you're looking for a mouthwash that's gets the koo done. Look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Flynn

customer_reviews.title: The shape
customer_reviews.text: The look of the bottle wasn’t something I was expecting but, rather shaped like almost an hour-glass figure.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Blanco

customer_reviews.title: This didn't do anything for me
customer_reviews.text: I didnt like the after taste. After I raise my mounth my breath don't smell fresh to me. I dont know if the mixture of my toothpaste or what. I dont like the after taste.
customer_reviews.author: Lovebug

customer_reviews.title: So fresh, so clean!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old brushes her teeth with water and baking soda because she hates the taste of traditional toothpastes, even the kid flavors. She LOVES this mouthwash, as do I! It's a light taste and leaves my breath smelling fresh. I will never go without having this product in my home. Also, the owner of the company emailed me to see how I was liking the product. The customer service alone would be reason for me to buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Owens

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: Very good flavor and fresh feeling only thing is that it could fight bacteria a bit better but you can't ask for everything when trying to cut out alcohol and glycerin from your mouth wash so that considered its really good!
customer_reviews.author: manos lupassakis

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! Tastes great and works well!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic mouthwash! It has lots of beneficial ingredients in it. I had pain and sensitivity in one tooth and even after the first gargle, my tooth felt better! I use the Lumineux Clean and Fresh twice a day and what a difference it has made! I just ordered 4 more bottles: (2 for my daughters-2 for me).
customer_reviews.author: Neshamah Dillard Maillard

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor and amount of price!
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor and amount for price! I have been using in combination with the whitening toothpaste and can see an extra sparkle in my smile. I look forward to seeing how my teeth get whiter in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: This is an AMAZING natural mouthwash!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this mouthwash several times before and have been in love with it since the first use.I am an advocate for natural health products and enjoy finding hidden gems out there, like this one. The essential oils are wonderfully balanced and it always leaves my mouth feeling refreshed. If you have not used this mouthwash before and are on the fence, I highly suggest that you give it a try and I hope you enjoy it as much as I have.
customer_reviews.author: A.E.B

customer_reviews.title: No STING!
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great. Easy to use. Rinse and gargle for 1 minute, no problem. Does NOT sting or cause dry-moutn, like an alcohol-based mouthwash does. Dentist noticed big improvement in my gingivitis after just 6 months using this. Reasonable price, great results!
customer_reviews.author: GeoFan

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Mouthwash
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a natural, effective mouthwash and my dentist recommended I look at Lumineux. She said not everyone likes the taste, but I had no problem with it. It's not that minty or medicine-y taste most common in mouthwashes. It's an all natural flavor that is different, but tastes fine. The natural ingredients are good for your oral health. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Brace

customer_reviews.title: I love that I switched to this mouthwash
customer_reviews.text: I love that I switched to this mouthwash. I used to get crest or listerine or whatever at the drug store. You all know, that stuff can burn pretty good. No burning sensation here whatsoever and my mouth feels extra clean after
customer_reviews.author: Tio Jefe

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend switching to this product!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the mouthwash and tooth paste for a few years now and love them. Much healthier alternative to conventional tooth paste/wash! Also love the taste and feel. Highly recommend over dr bronners. I havent tried other natual brands to compare. These wont foam or burn like conventional products and thats good! They still have a great feel. Thanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by dentist
customer_reviews.text: Has worked well to help gingivitis Fresh in mouth. Best mouth wash I’ve tried. Was recommended by dentist
customer_reviews.author: Deb Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Gentle & Effective
customer_reviews.text: I really like the gentle ingredients in this product. It helps with dry mouth and leaves a long lasting freshness after use. After using harsh alcohol based mouthwashes for years, I can say I’ll never go back.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: didn't taste good. Dumped down the drain>
customer_reviews.text: For me , didn't taste good. Dumped down the drain>
customer_reviews.author: Dave T

customer_reviews.title: Really helped with sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: The sensitive version of this has really helped with my sensitivity issues. Bought this version since other was out of stock I assume due to covid 19 (sensitive version is now back in stock and I recently bought it as well). Just started to use the clean and fresh version hope it works as well.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Drying!
customer_reviews.text: This product dries out my mouth. I'll finish the bottle. However, I will not purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Mason

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mouthwash
customer_reviews.text: Gentle yet effective ingredients and pleasant tasting. Lumineaux Oral Essentials mouthwash and toothpaste are my go-to for improving and maintaining my oral health. Happy customer for over 5 years!
customer_reviews.author: Tiosejo

customer_reviews.title: Certified Non-Toxic
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Lumineaux clean & fresh mouthwash for several years and I love it. I also gift it to family members who are looking to reduce or eliminate harsh chemicals in their personal hygiene products. I have a sensitivity to harsh chemicals and products such as this have helped me to feel better physically. I also love the flavor!
customer_reviews.author: R. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Lumineux was recommended to me by my dental hygenist to improve my gum health. At my next visit, about 4 months later, the hygenist noted an improvement in my overall gum health. I have been a regular user ever since. It has really helped improve my visits to the dentist.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Natural mouthwash
customer_reviews.text: I’m excited to have found a mouthwash that is more safe and natural. Looking forward to the results after more use. I still need to use this product for a bit longer to make any definite claims by so far so good, I really like it. As long as the ingredients are natural and healthier for my mouth biome then I’m happy enough. Thanks :~}
customer_reviews.author: zach hatch

customer_reviews.title: The ONLY Mouthwash I can use !
customer_reviews.text: I've always hated mouthwash, but wanted to use it. I've tried other brands non-alcohol versions and I still hated it. Used it once and gave it away. I tried this on a whim and not only does it not burn, it REFRESHES my mouth and MAKES MY TEETH WHITER! And I'm not even using the whitening version , just the original. This is the best product ever. I do wish it was cheaper lol. Enjoy
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: I wanted a mouthwash that did not have alcohol in ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a mouthwash that did not have alcohol in it as recently there have been report that it can contribute to mouth cancer. So having this on the market was just what was needed. Very pleasant taste and worth the price if you want something natural with no sugar or alcohol in it. Well done
customer_reviews.author: Gregory H.

customer_reviews.title: Need a better sealing or stronger cap structure for product to be available for use.
customer_reviews.text: The cap and seal has been broken almost every time they’ve arrived to my home.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Houbein

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: My son and I use this product (and many others from this company). I like that it does not have any alcohol in it, and that it is non-toxic. It is important to me to use products that are safe and also effective. This line was originally recommended by our dentist. We love the products.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great Natural Product
customer_reviews.text: We used traditional mouthwash for years and when looking to go natural I made several recipes myself and they were so gross. This is the first mouthwash that was all natural that still felt fresh and gave good breath. We will continue to use and will try their toothpaste next!
customer_reviews.author: Elaina

customer_reviews.title: cleans well, but taste awful
customer_reviews.text: it cleans really well, but the smell and taste I can't stand.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi L.

customer_reviews.title: i bought this mouth wash for my girlfriend she is ...
customer_reviews.text: i bought this mouth wash for my girlfriend she is allergic to a lot of things, she loves this product. fresh. minty
customer_reviews.author: Lali hernandez

customer_reviews.title: My wife will kiss me after using this!
customer_reviews.text: Great mouthwash without all the chemicals! It seems they used to have an organic version that I liked better but this one still has some organic ingedients and works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Donald C.

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I like this product and I am happy it's around to buy and use. Since I am very much conscious about GMO and Non Organic products, It is so nice to not have the harsh chemicals (Alcohol) in your mouth early in the morning , I've felt a huge difference freshness of my teeth, mouth, and breath since I started using. I agree It's a little bit more cost since you pay for shipping but it worth every penny! Overall, this mouthwash is great, I love how my mouth feels after wash and taste of Dead Sea Salt ! Wow! I am a Fan.
customer_reviews.author: K. P. M.

customer_reviews.title: Ended up with a VERY dry mouth and throat.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't able to see if it would benefit me at all, my first use resulted in a very, very dry mouth and throat, dryer than I can remember it ever being without accidentally sleeping with my mouth open. This product is supposed to moisturize your mouth, not dry it out. I have enough problems with dry mouth without using something that adds to the problem. So unfortunately, this is something I can't use.
customer_reviews.author: ThereseTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t help . Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special . Way too expensive. It was made in Beverly Hills so What do you expect.. I will not be reordering.
customer_reviews.author: cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Did not like the taste.
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a great product, but I really don't like the taste. I feel like the product works well, but I have a hard time with the taste, so I did not continue to use the product and purchased a different mouthwash instead that has a better taste to it. I may try a different flavor of this mouthwash in the future because I do feel like it is a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: terry r

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have had problems with sensitive teeth. I switched to this product and it has worked well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't have that overly powerful taste like Listerine does
customer_reviews.text: Very mild, but tastes fresh. Doesn't have that overly powerful taste like Listerine does. Is it as effective as Listerine, though? We'll see what my dentist says.
customer_reviews.author: HERMANATOR

customer_reviews.title: Safe/Clean whitening mouth wash
customer_reviews.text: When I use this 2x a day my teeth look whiter . Clean oral care is important to me.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great Natural Product
customer_reviews.text: We love this mouthwash and the toothpaste! Tastes great, whitens and is a good value as compared to other natural mouthwashes. We love the fact that there are no hidden toxins.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Ascencio

customer_reviews.title: Safety seal was open!
customer_reviews.text: The item came with the safety seal open. Absolutely unacceptable for a personal item such as this. For the price paid, this is outrageous. Now I can't even return the item.
customer_reviews.author: Joaquim E. Vieira

customer_reviews.title: Love this mouthwash
customer_reviews.text: This mouthwash is great, it works really well, and the fact that it has less chemicals and additives gives me peace of mind. At first I thought it had an aftertaste, but as long as you gargle for the recommended 60 seconds, it just feels fresh afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Julie M. Laba

customer_reviews.title: Best ingredients best results
customer_reviews.text: Actually does it’s job! No dry mouth super fresh feeling no sting of usual mouthwash and all the ingredients are awesome
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: Familiar with that terrible taste in your mouth when you need a root canal?
customer_reviews.text: I've never tasted cat urine, however, I imagine this is what it tastes like.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Very good for fresh breath
customer_reviews.text: This product is a very good natural breath freshener. I use it after brushing teeth and it works better than listerine. It's also a little milder.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: My kids & I have been using this for a few years & find the taste refreshing & our mouths feel minty fresh after.
customer_reviews.author: James & Racheal

product_meta.title: Lumineux Oral Essentials Mouthwash 2 Pack - Clean & Fresh Breath - Certified Non Toxic | Fresh Breath in 14 Days w/o Sensitivity | Fluoride Free | NO Alcohol, SLS Free, Dentist Formulated
product_meta.description: Lumineux is the first truly ethical oral care company to emerge on the market in close to a century. Founded on decades of international research conducted by two world-renowned dentists, our products have a back-to-basics approach that use naturally occurring ingredients like Dead Sea salt, aloe vera juice and potent essential oils to handle the source of bad breath, decay and disease without cumulative side-effects, and unnecessary additives. Lumineux is the first oral care product to protect the oral micro biome and neutralize the toxins of bad bacteria, rather than indiscriminately killing bacteria. The result is a clean, non-toxic, and proven effective line of solutions that are backed by clinical and in-the-field studies that are truly head and shoulders above what’s available to consumers. Dr. Kourosh Maddahi, Lumineux’s Founder and CEO, puts it perfectly, saying, “You shouldn’t have to choose between a product that’s good for you, and a product that actually works.” Lumineux remains the only oral care line to carry the Made Safe certification, as well as Non- Toxic certification for all its products from the LEMI Lab in France, and head-to-head clinical studies against every leading brand from the University of Irvine, California.
feature_bullets: Freshens Breath without Harsh Chemicals: Alcohol Free, Certified Non-Toxic, Sugar Free, Dye Free, Preservative Free, BPA Free, Dentist-Formulated & Recommended, No Stinging or Burning, Naturally Derived Ingredients, and tastes great.

Certified Non-Toxic: Our mouthwash does not contain any alcohol, preservatives, or other cytotoxic ingredients. Instead we use pure and unrefined ingredients such as Dead Sea Salt, Organic Aloe Vera Juice, French Essential Oils, and Non-GMO Xylitol.

Supports Healthy Gum and Teeth: You could call our mouthwash a mouth moisturizer. It is designed to keep your oral tissues moist and pink using naturally derived ingredients that are Non-Toxic and Non GMO.
Dentist-Formulated & Recommended Mouthwash: Each ingredient in our mouthwash was selected for its benefits and purity by professionals who have treated thousands of patients from all over the globe

BALANCING THE NATURAL ORAL MICROBIOME: 98% of the bacteria in your mouth is good bacteria! Our philosophy is to maintain a balanced ecosystem in the mouth by neutralizing the toxins of bacteria, while protecting good bacteria.
